text: Eghtɨ Babilonɨn atrivim izɨva tuavir akamningɨn nɨ osirigha asarazir bizimɨn mɨriamɨn mɨtɨgham. Egh a tuavir manamra mangɨsɨ fofoghsɨ, faragh uan barir pibar mɨdorozir akavsiabar amu, uan afuzir mɨzebagh ivivamang dagh inobagh inobagham. Egh a uan afuzitam Raban akagh, egh tam Jerusalemɨn akakagham. Eghtɨ atrivim afuzir vamɨra iniam. A uaghan asebar azangsɨghsɨ, ofa gamizir asɨzir dɨghorimɨn ganɨva anesavsuigham.
